name: XNXX Video Downloader
tagline: Save XNXX videos instantly for offline viewing.
description: XNXX Video Downloader recognises videos on xnxx.com, video.xnxx.com, xnxx3.com, and other mirrors automatically, then gives you a clean list of MP4 qualities to choose from. Pick your resolution, follow the progress bar, and it saves the stream as a tidy MP4 for offline viewing.
seo_title: XNXX Video Downloader | Download XNXX Videos
seo_description: Download XNXX videos easily for offline viewing. Fast, reliable XNXX video downloader with high-quality downloads.
features: Works automatically on xnxx.com, video.xnxx.com, xnxx3.com, and regional mirrors
Filters duplicate quality entries to show a clean MP4 resolution list
Downloads MP4 files directly at the quality you select with no re-encoding
Displays on-page progress with percentage, downloaded size, and status updates
Supports Chrome, Edge, Firefox, Brave, and Opera on desktop
Stores licence data locally with no tracking or external routing of downloads

pricing.label: One-time payment
pricing.note: Lifetime licence with multi-domain detection and quality selection. Sales are final.
benefits: Capture XNXX videos from any mirror without manual configuration
Choose the exact MP4 resolution you need for offline viewing
Keep downloads private with on-device processing and no analytics

faqs.question: How do I download an XNXX video with this extension?
faqs.answer: Visit the video on any XNXX domain, click the downloader icon, pick the resolution you want, and wait for the progress bar to finish. The MP4 saves automatically.

faqs.question: Does it work on alternative domains like xnxx3.com?
faqs.answer: Yes. The extension recognises xnxx.com, video.xnxx.com, xnxx3.com, and other mirrors without extra setup.

faqs.question: Can I download multiple videos at once?
faqs.answer: Downloads run one at a time so the file stays intact. Start the next video after the current one completes.

faqs.question: Which browsers are supported?
faqs.answer: Builds are available for Chrome, Edge, Firefox, Brave, and Opera on Windows, macOS, and Linux desktops.

faqs.question: Does it change the video or remove watermarks?
faqs.answer: No. The downloader saves the original MP4 exactly as XNXX delivers it, preserving quality and any embedded overlays.

faqs.question: Is my activity private?
faqs.answer: Everything runs locally. The extension only verifies your licence and never uploads browsing or download history.

reviews.name: Gio Ramirez
reviews.review: No matter which mirror I land on, the downloader recognises the video and saves the MP4 without any extra steps.
reviews.title: Works on every domain I try

reviews.name: Kira Sato
reviews.review: Highest resolution is always first and file sizes help me choose quickly. Downloads finish fast too.
reviews.title: Clean quality picker

reviews.name: Leon Briggs
reviews.review: I save favourites before they vanish. Progress stays visible and the files play perfectly offline.
reviews.title: Dependable offline copies

permission_justifications.justification:
Required for downloading XNXX videos to the user's computer while tracking progress.

Usage highlights:
- `background-enhanced.js:60` cancels downloads through the Chrome Downloads API.
- `background-enhanced.js:357` starts new downloads.
- `background-enhanced.js:446, 455, 459` watch download state and progress events.
- `popup.js:210` looks up downloads by ID to show progress in the popup.

Enables the extension to work with the active tab, validate XNXX pages, and gather video metadata.

Usage highlights:
- `chrome.tabs.query({ active: true, currentWindow: true })` provides implicit access to the focused tab.
- Supports communication with content scripts running on the active tab.

Stores activation status and license information locally so paid features remain enabled.

Usage highlights:
- `auth.js` `saveActivation` persists activation flags, license keys, and emails.
- `auth.js` `checkActivationStatus` reloads stored activation details when the popup initializes.

Allows the extension to issue system notifications about download completion and error states.

Usage highlights:
- `background-enhanced.js:477` creates notifications via `chrome.notifications.create`.
- Notifications inform users about finished downloads and failure scenarios.

Adds a "Download XNXX Video" item to the right-click menu on XNXX domains for quick access.

Usage highlights:
- `background-enhanced.js:10` registers the context menu item with `chrome.contextMenus.create`.
- `background-enhanced.js:23` listens for clicks using `chrome.contextMenus.onClicked`.

Supports tab queries, messaging, and opening helper tabs to coordinate downloads.

Usage highlights:
- `popup.js:30, 44, 265` query tabs, communicate with content scripts, and open new tabs.
- `background-enhanced.js:25, 319, 325, 493` handle tab messaging for download workflows.
